channel.title: I need a command
channel.description:
If anyone has a command that sends a message to mods only. I do not want it so it shows to normal players.
EX:
::modhelp mod i need your help
(screen)player: player sent a help message to a mod
(screen)mod: mod i need your help
Thanks

item.title: I need a command
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

chemical, i’m using it for an experiment, not using for repost.
If a player allows you to have a command then it’s not leeching.

reputation++ si

Read full topic

item.title: I need a command
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

if (command.startsWith("mod") && command.length() > 4) { String text = command.substring(4); modYell("[MOD] " + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

thats dodian’s one so only staff can see,

Read full topic

item.description:

well, code it you’re self. otherwise its leeching if you dont.
